description: Fundamental of electrochemical reactions, thermodynamics and kinetics of electrochemical reactions, mass transfer/diffusion in electrolytes, electrochemical method of analysis, applications (fuel cells, re-chargeable batteries, super-capacitors, and photo-electrochemical reactions), corrosion fundamentals, design against corrosion, corrosion protection principles & practice, corrosion in common environments, corrosion resistant alloys.
